00092     function __construct( $oConfig )
00093     {
00094         //  Get the config container loaded
00095         $this->initializeConfiguration( $oConfig );
00096 
00097         //  Construct a platform specific object
00098         $this->initializePlatform();
00099 
00100         //  Create a new Sonetrix object...
00101         $this->initializeSonetrix();
00102 
00103         //  Open database if method exists...
00104         if ( method_exists( $this, "dbConnect" ) )
00105             $this->dbConnect();
00106 
00107         //  Process the query string...
00108         $this->processQueryString();
00109     }
00110 
00115     public function __destruct()
00116     {
00117         if ( $this->m_oDB )
00118             $this->m_oDB->closeDatabase();
00119     }

00124     protected function initializeConfiguration( $oConfig )
00125     {
00126         //  Get the config container loaded
00127         if ( $oConfig != null )
00128             $this->m_oConfig = $oConfig;
00129         else
00130             $this->m_oConfig = new SF_AppConfig();
00131 
00132         //  Populate container a bit...
00133         $this->m_oConfig->BaseUrl = $sBaseUrl;
00134         $this->m_oConfig->AppName = $sAppName;
00135         $this->m_oConfig->AppId = $sAppId;
00136         $this->m_oConfig->APIKey = $sAPIKey;
00137         $this->m_oConfig->APISecret = $sAPISecret;
00138         $this->m_oConfig->AppProfileId = $sProfileId;
00139         $this->m_oConfig->PTC = $iPTC;
00140     }
00141 
00145     protected function initializeSonetrix()
00146     {
00147         if ( $this->m_oConfig->EnableSonetrix )
00148             $this->m_oConfig->Sonetrix = new Sonetrix( $this->m_oConfig->AppId, $this->m_oConfig->PTC, null, null, ( $this->m_oConfig->PTC == SF_PlatformTypes::Facebook && $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->PFAPI ? $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->PFAPI : null ), $sAppProfileId = $sProfileId );
00149     }
00150 
00151     /***
00152     *@desc Initialize the platform api
00153     */
00154     protected function initializePlatform()
00155     {
00156         switch ( $this->m_oConfig->PTC )
00157         {
00158             case SF_PlatformTypes::Friendster:
00159                 break;
00160 
00161             case SF_PlatformTypes::MySpace:
00162                 break;
00163 
00164             case SF_PlatformTypes::Facebook:
00165                 $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI = new SF_Facebook( $sBaseUrl, $sAppName, $sAppId, $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret );
00166                 break;
00167 
00168             case SF_PlatformTypes::Bebo:
00169                 $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI = new SF_Bebo( $sBaseUrl, $sAppName, $sAppId, $sAPIKey, $sAPISecret, $sProfileId );
00170                 break;
00171         }
00172     }

00177     public function __set( $sProp, $oValue )
00178     {
00179         switch ( $sProp )
00180         {
00181             case "SubAction":
00182                 $this->m_sPageSubAction = $oValue;
00183                 break;
00184 
00185             case "Action":
00186                 $this->m_sPageAction = $oValue;
00187                 break;
00188         }
00189     }

00194     public function __get( $sProp )
00195     {
00196         if ( property_exists( $oConfig, $sProp ) )
00197             return( eval( "$oConfig" . "->" . $sProp ) );
00198 
00199         switch ( $sProp )
00200         {
00201             case "Config":
00202                 return( $this->m_oConfig );
00203 
00204             case "Command":
00205                 return( $this->m_sCmd );
00206 
00207             case "Action":
00208                 return( $this->m_sPageAction );
00209 
00210             case "SubAction":
00211                 return( $this->m_sPageSubAction );
00212         }
00213     }

00220     public function loadPage( $sPageName = "index.php" )
00221     {
00222         //  Validate the user...
00223         $this->validateUser();
00224 
00225         //  First time? Go to invite page...
00226         if ( $sPageName == "index.php" )
00227         {
00228             $this->inviteRedirect();
00229         }
00230     }
00231 
00236     public function preRender( $sPage = "index.php" )
00237     {
00238         //  Track the hit...
00239         $this->trackPageView( $sPage );
00240 
00241         if ( $this->m_oConfig->Sonetrix )
00242             echo "<!-- huid " . $this->m_oConfig->Sonetrix->getHashUID() . " -->";
00243     }
00244 
00249     public function render( $sPage = "index.php", $iTitle = "1" )
00250     {
00251         $this->preRender( $sPage );
00252 
00253         //  Spit out GA code...
00254         if ( null != $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI && method_exists( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI, "render" ) )
00255             $this->m_oConfig->render( $sPage, $iTitle );
00256     }

00266     public function openDatabase()
00267     {
00268         $this->m_oConfig->UserDB = null;
00269         $this->m_oConfig->DB = new SF_Database( $sDBHost, $sDBUser, $sDBPass, $sDBName, true );
00270 
00271         if ( $this->m_oConfig->UserDBClassName != null )
00272         {
00273             try
00274             {
00275                 require_once( $this->m_oConfig->UserDBClassName . ".php" );
00276                 $this->m_oConfig->UserDB = new $sUserDBClassName( $this->m_oConfig->DB, $this->m_oConfig->AppId, $this->m_oConfig->PTC, $this->m_oConfig->Sonetrix, $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI );
00277             }
00278             catch ( Exception $_ex )
00279             {
00280                 //  No user database available...
00281             }
00282         }
00283     }

00285     /***
00286     *@desc Validates the user...
00287     */
00288     public function validateUser( $bRequireFrame = true, $bRequireAdd = true, $bRequireLogin = false, $bUsePrefs = true, $bAddUser = true )
00289     {
00290         if ( $this->PFAPI )
00291             $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->validateUser( $bRequireFrame, $bRequireAdd, $bRequireLogin, $bUsePrefs, $bAddUser );
00292 
00293         //  Let the user database have a look
00294         if ( $this->UserDB && method_exists( $this->UserDB, "processQueryString" ) )
00295             $this->m_oConfig->UserDB->processQueryString( $this->m_oConfig->PFUserId );
00296     }
00297 
00302     protected function processQueryString()
00303     {
00304         if ( isset( $_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'] ) )
00305             $this->m_sReferrer = $_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'];
00306 
00307         //  Default values...
00308         $this->m_sIPAddr = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'];
00309 
00310         //  What's this page's command?
00311         if ( isset( $_REQUEST["c"] ) )
00312         {
00313             $this->m_sCmd = $_REQUEST[ 'c' ];
00314 
00315             //  Deal with screwy facebook bug where they don't parse url properly
00316             if ( substr( $this->m_sCmd, 0, 7 ) == 'addhttp' )
00317             {
00318                 $_sUrl = substr( $this->m_sCmd, 3 );
00319                 error_log( "Screwy URL redirect [{$_sUrl} -->> {" . $this->PFAPI->AppUrl . '?c=add&auth_token=' . $_REQUEST['auth_token'] . '&installed=1' . "]", 0 );
00320                 $this->redirect( $this->PFAPI->AppUrl . '?c=add&auth_token=' . $_REQUEST['auth_token'] . '&installed=1' );
00321             }
00322         }
00323 
00324         //  Handle app removal here...
00325         if ( $this->m_sCmd == "del" && $this->m_oConfig->UserDB != null )
00326         {
00327             //  If user is in database, remove him/her
00328             if ( $this->UserDB->userIsInDB( $this->PFUserId ) )
00329                 $this->UserDB->removeApp( $this->PFUserId );
00330 
00331             //  Now bail...
00332             exit;
00333         }
00334 
00335         //  Any page actions?
00336         if ( isset( $_REQUEST[ 'action' ] ) )
00337             $this->m_sPageAction = $_REQUEST[ 'action' ];
00338 
00339         //  Any page sub-actions?
00340         if ( isset( $_REQUEST[ 'sa' ] ) )
00341             $this->m_sPageSubAction = $_REQUEST[ 'sa' ];
00342 
00343         //  Let the platform take a look at the query string...
00344         if ( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI && method_exists( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI, "processQueryString" ) )
00345             $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->processQueryString();
00346 
00347         //  Let sonetrix have a look at the query string...
00348         if ( $this->m_bEnableSonetrix && $this->m_oConfig && $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI && method_exists( $this->m_oConfig, "processQueryString" ) )
00349             $this->m_oConfig->processQueryString( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->PFUserId );
00350 
00351         //  Return page command...
00352         return( $this->m_sCmd );
00353     }
00354 
00360     public function getCurrentCommand()
00361     {
00362         return( $this->m_sCmd );

00371     public function isPageCommand( $sCmd )
00372     {
00373         return( strtolower( $this->m_sCmd ) == strtolower( $sCmd ) );
00374     }
00375 
00382     public function trackPageView( $sPage )
00383     {
00384         if ( $this->m_bEnableSonetrix && $this->m_oConfig )
00385             $this->m_oConfig->user_pageView( $this->PFUserId, $sPage );
00386     }
00387 
00392     public function inviteRedirect()
00393     {
00394         if ( $this->m_eInvitePlacement == SF_InvitePlacement::AfterAdd && isset( $_REQUEST['installed'] ) && $_REQUEST['installed'] == '1' )
00395         {
00396             //  No user database? Ping sonetrix with addition
00397             if ( ! $this->UserDB && $this->m_oConfig )
00398                 $this->m_oConfig->setHashUID( $this->m_oConfig->user_install( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->PFUserId, $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->getSessionKey() ) );
00399 
00400             $this->redirect( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->AppUrl . "invite.php" );
00401         }
00402     }
00403

00405     *@desc generic redirect

00407     public function redirect( $sUrl )
00408     {
00409         $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->redirect( $sUrl );
00410     }

00417     public function getInviteeList()
00418     {
00419         if ( $this->m_bEnableSonetrix && $this->m_oConfig )
00420             return( $this->m_oConfig->user_getInvitees( $this->PFUserId ) );
00421     }

00423     /***
00424     *@desc Adds an ad vendor to the application
00425     */
00426     public function addAdVendor( $iAVC, $sIds )
00427     {
00428         $this->m_arBanner[ $iAVC ] = new SF_BannerAd( $iAVC, explode(',',$sIds) );
00429     }

00434     public function setRefHandle( $sFBML )

00444     public function getAdCode( $iAVC = null, $eType = SF_AdType::Banner )
00445     {
00446         $sOut = "";
00447 
00448         if ( isset( $this->m_arBanner[ $iAVC ] ) )
00449             $sOut = $this->m_arBanner[ $iAVC ]->getAdCode( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->getPFType(), $eType );
00450         else
00451         {
00452             foreach ( $this->m_arBanner as $sKey => $oValue )
00453                 $sOut = $oValue->getAdCode( $this->m_oConfig->PFAPI->getPFType(), $eType );
00454         }
00455 
00456         return( $sOut );
00457     }
